main event: A round object was observed in Fairbanks, Alaska on 30 November 1957, displaying cream and red colors with flashes of blue or white light.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 10-15 minutes based on multiple phone calls., The object was described as round and approximately 2.5 feet in diameter., Witnesses reported seeing flashes of red and blue light., There were multiple teletypes concerning the sighting, indicating a significant level of interest., The report speculated the object could be a meteor or possible remains of a Russian rocket.
sighted object: a round object with cream and red colors and flashes of light
witness description: Unspecified witnesses based on multiple phone calls
